website_summaries.verdict: A great natural fountain feature for the backyard that includes an LED light to enjoy at night.
pros: Looks very nice in a natural setting
Holds water well and does not tend to splash
Easy setup – just attach the pump, add water and plug in
Can also sit on a deck
cons: The lights on this fountain do not change colors

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fountain and had to write a review for other Amazon customers that may be interested in purchasing one. The sound is beautiful, and relaxing. It doesn't leak at all and overall I'm very pleased. Packed perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Robison

customer_reviews.title: Besides being the perfect size for our ground level deck
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded all expectations. Installation was simple and straightforward. Besides being the perfect size for our ground level deck, the best thing is the SOUND. Many of these water features sound like someone filling a bowl in the bathroom sink. This one sounds like the real thing, very soothing and peaceful. Had no trouble with the splashing others have mentioned. Use around five drops of algaecide every week to keep the water crystal clear. Would not hesitate to recommend it to anyone looking for a simple, good looking and sounding water feature that is a breezes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Karlac

customer_reviews.title: MY SECRET GARDEN
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small patio, but I put this there and surrounded it with flowers and now I have a beautiful serene place to relax and meditate and praise God. I absolutely love it!!!! No assembly required. I just filled with water and plunged it in. My patio is surrounded by tall bushes, which gives it privacy, but makes it seem very small. I remembered when I was in a small garden in Japan, the guide said that if you have water, rock and plants, you have a representation of the whole world. So with my fountain, my small place is transformed into a peaceful representation of the whole world! I call it my "Secret Garden."
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Diana

customer_reviews.title: Quality control suspect
customer_reviews.text: We really like the fountain, the peaceful and relaxing sounds of falling water. As a matter of fact, we bought two. However, we cannot seem to prevent either of them from splashing onto the surrounding ground. Moreover, one of the fountains developed a leak shortly after the 30-day Amazon return period ended so quality control is not the best. We could have requested a warranty repair from the manufacturer, but we would have been required to pay the return shipping costs for this 50# object. Fortunately, the purchase of a tube of epoxy fixed the leak.
customer_reviews.author: N M Prestigiacomo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Had it a week; so far so good. I've had many cheaper ($150) fountains and they were not very good. I am very impressed with this one. Here is why.. 1) Water-fall is powerful, strong stream, strong motor. 2) LED lights are awesome; tiny little lights built into rocks, no big bulbs to change. 3) Easy to assemble, connect the hose (very simple) and plug it in. Best cleaner believe it or not is white distilled vinegar. Have tried all of the "algae cleaners" over the years, nothing is better than distilled vinegar. Only need a cup once a week, no algae. I can't say enough good things about this fountain. One of my best amazon purchases ever.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Panesi

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Update: Still beautiful a year layer. I did give it a good scrub at the end of the summer last year and some paint came off. I bought some spray paint and looks good as new!
customer_reviews.author: AA in CO

customer_reviews.title: Large, impressive fountain
customer_reviews.text: My fountain just arrived today and it was a breeze to set up. Perfect for our bird garden which is just off of our patio. It's a large fountain and the pump gives good flow even on the lowest setting. I've only had it going for an hour or so now but really love it so far. I also purchased a remote outdoor outlet on Amazon so we can turn the pump on and off from inside as well. Cost $12 and works like a charm. I'll update in a few weeks, but so far it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Lane

customer_reviews.title: Cracked upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: I just set the fountain up for Memorial Day weekend. I had purchased the fountain in February. After having it set up for a week I noticed a very large crack on the back side of the fountain. Poor quality control. I unfortunately did not save the box so please be more careful when opening yours. It would cost over $100 to send it back. Not worth the aggravation because the fountain does work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fountain- worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged, arrived quickly and it's worth every dime! My courtyard is 20x15 and the sound is perfect, sounds like a small waterfall and holds a good amount of water-once a week maybe. The 'rocks', especially the small ones are incredibly real looking. We didn't use the LED lights as our out door plug wouldn't fit it AND the fountain pump-we have a flood on it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the color detail of this product. The variety of color and attention to detail make this fountain very realistic. Sounds of falling water is relaxing. My wife is happy, so it goes without saying..........
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed with the quality control of this product. It arrived packaged very well, but upon removing it from the styrofoam we noticed a chip off of the front (no chip in the package so it must have been done prior to packaging) and a large crack down the side. For nearly $300 I expect a product to arrive in perfect condition. The fountain works well and is lovely lit up at night. It's a little loud with the water running. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: aslterp_shannon

customer_reviews.title: I would like money back from the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these one for us and one for my Mom a couple of weeks ago. We both have leaks but no longer have the shipping material and they are heavy. Trying to figure out where the leak is coming from. I would like money back from the manufacturer. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Even Greater Service!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased one of Alpine's 4-tier fountains with LED lights. I am absolutely thrilled with the product. However, even more importantly, I experienced a component failure ... in this case the LED transformer. When I was able to reach Alpine"s Customer Service, on the day the product arrived, they ended up moving heaven and earth to get a replacement to me ... in spite of the c=fact that California had just shut down again! The Customer Service team geta an A+ in my book, and will get any future business, as well as recommendations I may have cause to generate! Randy Worthington
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice-while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Another cheap Chinese product. It worked great for a year. Then, it started losing water and running near dry at an alarming rate. The water was slowly draining out the bottom and made a mess on my screen porch floor. I drained the unit completely and shined a flashlight inside against the bottom. To my surprise, an incredible amount of light shined - the bottom is paper thin! I'm going to try liquid rubber and rust-o-leum stop leak spray and see if I can bring it back to life. Stop making things on the cheap-o in China.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and we love it’s natural-looking beauty
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a fountain on my backyard patio with a loud water sound and the natural look of a rock pool in the forest. This fountain filled both requirements nicely. I surrounded it with both tropical and flowering plants and I am delighted with the finished look. The sound of the water falling from pool to pool is loud enough to relax and make for an inviting place to enjoy sitting, but unfortunately is not loud enough to drown out traffic or airplanes. The lighting at night makes the fountain pools look so pretty. I highly recommend this fountain, it is both a great value and a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Quality Water Feature! Nice sound.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to buy a water fountain for quite some time. I'm really happy with this one! It only takes 4 gallons of distilled water, and has a nice output of water flow. As others have said, it's no dripping sounds, but a full on fountain of steady streaming water fall. I love that it has LED lighting also! Sounds so lovely outside. Way better than the small ones offered locally. Great value and a quality product too!
customer_reviews.author: Blueberry Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sound
customer_reviews.text: As I water my plants, I water my fountain. At first I used the distilled water To fill it like it said to. but on these hot sunny days as the water Evaporates, Im not running to store each time for distilled water. So be sure to refill from time to time with water so the pump doesn’t run dry. The birds and humming birds are enjoying it as well now. Now that there used to a foreign object being in the yard. The lights are a nice touch at night time as well. So far my husband has not Peed his pants like he said he would by the sound it makes🤣haha! I love this fountain!
customer_reviews.author: Doug and Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water fountain with nice detailing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent water fountain with nice detailing. It actually sounds like a real waterfall. It has a very pronounced and pleasing sound providing "white noise" which cloaks other distracting sounds. I have often falling to sleep while relaxing near it. I highly recommend this beautiful fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and Ugly
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought this waterfall would look nice in the back yard. However, as time passed I realized that it wasn't as attractive as I thought it would be. It began to look like a sore thumb standing out there. Also, it seemed to consume too much water; every day I would have to add 3 to 4 gallons of water to keep it topped off, otherwise the level could have fallen below the pump and burn it out. Got rid of it and designed my own water fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Villhelm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a few issues
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box was beat up. Only one spot cracked on the faux rock but it is in a high location on the back away from any water issues. Pump did quit the first day but I was able to get it to start back up. I bought the protection plan and will be sending them a messAge to be prepared if the pump goes out. It is a little louder than I wanted but not enough to go to the trouble of sending back. Beyond that, it is a nice beautiful product and the lighting feature is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with fountain, very ez setup and very clear instructions. Very nice gentile sounding water fall effect, the led lights are a plus, very nice at night. Have had no problem with water splashing out as some have claimed. There is an adjustment on the pump to adjust the water flow. Thanks to the Company who made this fountain, very good quality, light weight and looks nice. Wouldn't mind having another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: krh316

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Poor Quality Material
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is beautiful and we have enjoyed it for a couple of months. Putting it away for the winter we had to turn it upside down to empty. Unfortunately, there we a couple of pinholes under the pools that leak and a major crack on the side. Some of the material on the outside is already starting to flake off. We also had the pump go bad after 2 weeks; however the company quickly replaced it with a better one.
customer_reviews.author: LPLoveland

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: SECOND UPDATE: Received the replacement LED after contacting customer service. Good communication and a prompt replacement for the defective component. Happy with the end result. UPDATE: One of the 3 LED lights has quit working 3 days after receiving the fountain. I have contacted the manufacturer and they are sending a replacement. I will update the review and the rating again after receiving the replacement. This fountain is absolutely beautiful! The sound of the water trickling is very relaxing. The size of the fountain is nice and it is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: OKIEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Good fountain for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice medium sized fountain. We had a fountain that we had custom built that created a TON of noise (which is what we loved about it) but had to replace it. This one doesn't make as much noise as our previous fountain but I think it would work for most people. We mainly have a fountain because we are trying to block out road noise, which this does to an extent but probably not as much as other fountains would. The lights are nice, however you need a second plug to plug that in to, they are not wired together.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Tosello

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fountain
customer_reviews.text: This fountain was very easy to put together. For its size, the weight is pretty good. It is heavy but not too bad. I am 75 years old and I was able to cart it to my backyard and set it up. I am very happy with this fountain. It flows beautifully. With the lights going at night, it has made a nice addition to my garden and yard. There are two plugs needed for this fountain. You will need one plug for the pump and another plug for the lights. I got a splitter so when I want to turn it off I just unplug the one plug.
customer_reviews.author: Teachaway

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: Comes completely assembled. You just have to level it and plug it in and add water. Pump is on low but has a strong flow and creates a noticeable waterfall sound. Lights make for a nice look at night. Seams well constructed. Heavy rains have not affected it in any way. The back of the falls continue the front facade so it doesn't appear fake looking at it from the back. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OLDER THAN DIRT

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty fountain. The water is quite loud
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty fountain. The water is quite loud, which is exactly what I wanted for white noise. There is new construction going on in our neighborhood and it was driving us crazy. Problem solved with this fountain! I keep it in my room and I don't have any problems with water splashing. Pump is very quiet if positioned right. The only very mild con is it smells little weird at the beginning, so I put essential oils over it. Otherwise very happy with the purchase. Also I was very impressed how fast they shipped it to me, it came much earlier than it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very soothing. Automated with float valve and zwave
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and had no issues like breaks, leaks. Looks very nice in the garden and had no issues adjusting water flow. Water sounds soothing and does not splash unless there is wind. Highly satisfied so far. Please see the attached pics where a float valve was added by drilling a hole and connecting to garden watering system. Now no need to worry about filling water. Just need to clean once a month. Also added a zwave outlet to add multiple on of times for each day of week.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cascading fountain
customer_reviews.text: I love water features and have owned many through the years. This fountain is light weight yet sturdy and solid. The water flow is extremely well designed with lots of water volume even at the lowest pump setting. The color variations add depth and character to the very realistic faux rocks. The only negative is the warning on the documents stating that color will fade if exposed to water and sun. Really? An outdoor fountain exposed to water and sun? Go figure. They also recommend sealing it every 6 months. That should not be required of an outdoor man made product. Will let you know how it holds up, but for now very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Serra

customer_reviews.title: So impressed I ordered a second one
customer_reviews.text: This is not cheap junk but a well made 4 tier waterfall. It looks so real it is scary. There is nothing to assemble but plug in the pump after attaching it to a hose. Then fill. I have this on my patio and very nice to listen to in the evening. The only thing I would have to say is the LED lights are somewhat brighter than I would like. I'd prefer a warmer golden color. But hey we can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: ColdWarVet75

customer_reviews.title: Best fountain ever! Attractive and relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: We just built a new house and discovered that our neighbors like to drink and socialize every afternoon on their patio only about 30 feet from our porch. Despite a fence and trees and trellis, their animated chatter becomes annoying fast. In desperation, I started researching fountains that are both attractive and have a loud enough flow to muffle unwanted noise. This fountain does the trick. It is very realistic-looking (I didn’t attach the included lights), and the water flow creates a peaceful, spa-like atmosphere. It is not cheap or tacky looking like so many inexpensive fountains, and it is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Calista S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice..but can't plug in lights just fountain
customer_reviews.text: great fountain but can't use lights as both plugs interfere with each other. Chalk the lighting problem up to bad design and or manufacturing wrong way. Really a bad idea to run extensions outside of plug box. Fix would be to remove lights from fountain as OSHA violation for you to use extension cord near water. Near term they need to take lights off of description and remove plug from box. Flow is nice and looks great just one thing wrong so far, But not worth the price. Called company and they said it was not their problem.called amazon and got hung up on still waiting for callback.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Links

customer_reviews.title: Prefect backyard fountain without weighing 500 pounds
customer_reviews.text: love love love this fountain! It is exactly what I wanted. Great packaging, damage free. All parts included. Out of the box, filled up, plugged in and running within 5 minutes! I purchased this for backyard birds and of course it had rained every day since. "It never rains in Southern California" No splashing. Great water sounds. We are a military family, we'll be able to move this with us without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

customer_reviews.title: Don't  Throw the Box Away To Soon!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice fountain, BUT it had a leak when we put it together. My husband worked on it and finally got it where there is only a small leak. For $300 I was expecting better quality. I might have sent it back to exchange for another one, but my husband threw away the box before putting it together. I didn't have enough another box large enough to send it back. There was a large crack that leaked at first. All the water leaked out. We repaired it to where only a small amount leaks. It's a nice fountain, but DON"T THROW AWAY THE BOX TOO SOON!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Akers

customer_reviews.title: Everything we hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: The order was delivered early. Assembly was very easy due to the excellent illustrated instructions and a very well made product. The water flow is good with a pleasant sound. Based on initial results we are very pleased with this waterfall and feel it is good value for money. We decided to buy the extended warranty which starts when the manufacturers warranty expires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this fountain. It is my first fountain - works great - so easy to assemble. Water flow is so relaxing - noise is amazing. So easy to maintain. I just add one gallon of distilled water and a cup of white vinegar weekly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: weser

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pump died just 8 days after return window closed. Argh
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the fountain is very good. Couple of things though, the control valve on the pump is less than adequate. Flow is still really fast on any setting. Quite a bit of water splashes out. I have it outside so not a huge issue. I did add another control valve to the pump to slow down the flow rate, lessons the amount of water that splashes out.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t use it indoors. Surrounding area gets misted/damp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sturdy fountain. Works great. The only issue I had is the speed of water flow. It has dial to adjust speed, but doesn’t work. We have just one speed - fast. It is beautifully designed. Rocks are very realistic looking. It is a great addition to our back deck. I would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katthen

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in the corner of my screened-in patio. It looks great! Also, we love the waterfall sound. I would give it 5 stars except for one relatively minor issue...there were no instructions at all on how to connect and set up pump or lights. Granted, it doesn’t take much to figure it out, but some sketches on assembly and filling would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: hitchcockfan2

customer_reviews.title: Pleasently surprised
customer_reviews.text: The advertisements looked good but we didn't know what to expect........ upon opening we could tell right away that this was going to be a super nice addition to our décor..... the water fall is exceptionally well build with a lot of attention paid to details and we love it.....the rocks looks very real and it is easy to set up and get started...... We have one small issue with the pump but when I called alpine they were very helpful and I'm sure this issue will be resolved very quickly....Thanks Alpine for making such a wondereful product available
customer_reviews.author: Fearnofishbob

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Fountain!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain has brought me and my family so much joy and met all of our expectations. Our backyard was recently landscaped and wanted something special. We were pleasantly surprised how authentic the sound of the water is and spend many hours listening to it. The picture provided is a work in progress but wanted to share with other customers. The product is well made, delivered promptly with no damage despite the size and well packaged. The quality of this product is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniea

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival - warranty support perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fountain is beautiful and was very easy to assemble. However, both the pump and the lights were dead on arrival. Bought this as a Christmas gift and just now warm enough outside to assemble, so didn't find the issue until now. Submitted a warranty claim to the manufacturer. Will be back to update the review pending how Alpine's customer support pans out. Updated to 5 stars - warranty support was great!
customer_reviews.author: BSW

customer_reviews.title: Rocktastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have never shared a picture of a product I have purchased on here until now. I love this fountain!!! The reviews say that it does splash and they are correct. I have it around my hostas so I don’t mind. I haven’t experienced the lights at night as I literally received it today and had to write a review. The color has more copper than what is shown in the description. I don’t mind as it reminds me of many of my hiking trips to waterfalls. I wish I had bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Can’t Quit

customer_reviews.title: Best fountain ever!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is AMAZING! Bought and returned two other models from a different company and then purchased two of these. They were a breeze to set up, make the most natural amazing sounds of moving water, no splashing or loss of water and they hold enough water that they last without refilling for a long time even in triple digit summer heat. Sound is soothing and just loud enough to diffuse city noises a bit. Love the lights at night. Really pretty and natural looking as well. We just leveled the ground, laid down some gravel, put down a concrete stepping stone and set them on top. Would HIGHLY recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Best investment I ever made
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching and reading reviews for a while now and finally I received just what I was looking for. This video shows the slow setting, but I put it on the faster setting and the sound of a river flowing is perfect! It is not the trickle dripping sound that so many of these fountains have. I sit on my porch outside after dinner and the sound is so relaxing! I will be, for sure, taking naps out there! Thank you Alpine for making a wonderful fountain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this fountain except it does sound like ...
customer_reviews.text: I set it up indoors. I love everything about this fountain except it does sound like someone left the hose on, not like a trickling stream, and it's even on the lowest setting. But it's very sturdy and beautiful (especially with the LED's on) I also put a remote control on the outlet, which works great! I can see that working even better if it was outside and you want to turn it on from inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT FIND!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were looking at waterfalls at our local nursery and even though they were selling at 50% off, they were very overpriced. I came back home and found this one on-line and ordered it. It came in a couple of days, wonderfully packaged to prevent any damage. My husband put it together in about 5 minutes. I was pleasantly surprised at how much water it held. I was concerned we may need to fill it frequently, but the water tank is really quite large. It looks like real rock and runs beautifully. I can't wait to see it at night as it has lights coming up from each tier. What a wonderful find! Great for any garden!
customer_reviews.author: Siggi Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fountain! It's so beautiful and sounds wonderful. I put a couple paver stones under mine to raise it up higher and then added rocks around the base. What a great addition to my bare backyard! You will be very pleased if you order this. It was packaged very well and there was no damage whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised by how much water this fountain holds and how much water flows through it. The water is quite a bit louder than I expected it to be (that’s a good thing), so it makes the ambiance of my front yard feel like it’s on the water. I also really like the LED lights after dark. Very quick and easy to assemble and set up. Not that heavy to move around. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great waterfall fountain, highly recommended, easy install, is a little bit darker than the picture. took 7 gallons of distilled water, don't wait to order one. I only use it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the water flow is way to fast and too loud. Bad customer services
customer_reviews.text: The water flow is way too fast ..so rush. It is so loud. So opposite of relaxing. There suppose to be lever to control the flow..but it does not work..make no differences. Contacted customer service..no response. Too big and too late to return it. I will see I can find an alternative pump to replace the original the pump so I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: alicepopeye

customer_reviews.title: Alpine 4 tier waterfall
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! We needed to replace the waterfall in my mother's Garden. This one is way better than the first one I had the sound is incredible I've attached video so you can see how beautiful this waterfall is. You won't be disappointed. This is the best price here on Amazon, I looked everywhere. Home Depot is selling this for $100 MORE!
customer_reviews.author: jojoharley

customer_reviews.title: I have loved this fountain
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this fountain, however lately (after 3 months of ownership), I have to fill it daily. I'm wondering if there is a leak. I have not moved it, but I am wondering if there was a breakdown in the material.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect...except one LED light not working
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is everything I hoped it would be, except the top LED light never worked. I did a ton of research and this is the best there is for the price. My handyman put it together and struggled a bit with the pump...but figured it out in about 10 minutes. As you can see, I built a rock/fern garden around it and that definitely helped make it feel more like real rocks. I live near a busy highway, so I like that the sound is fairly loud. It doesn't completely drown out the traffic, but helps.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and inefficient
customer_reviews.text: This product was extremely disappointing! It is very high maintenance. It says to use distilled water in it. It goes through about a gallon of it a day because it splashes out. We have done everything we can to make sure it is level, but it makes no difference. It's too expensive to keep it running using a gallon of distilled water a day. It is also very plasticy and fake looking. We spent $300 on this fountain and now it just sits gathering dust because it's too expensive to keep it running. Wish we had picked a different option.
customer_reviews.author: Round Eyes

customer_reviews.title: One piece, good water reservoir, but missing instructions, broken parts
customer_reviews.text: One piece, no assembly, decent water reservoir. But did not come with instruction/care guide, and small plastic parts (apparently to support water pump) were just tossed in reservoir, arrived cracked or in pieces. Water access opening has no cover; if used outside, insects, small birds etc can get inside. If seller sees this, would like replacements for small parts and instruction sheet
customer_reviews.author: SACTrndKlr

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound of water
customer_reviews.text: The directions said fill at the top! That was not easy...had to use a funnel for 7.5 gallons of distilled water with an 8 cup measuring cup! When it ran low on water I just put water in the lowest basin and it was fine. So don’t know if it was necessary to fill it from the top. Had to tilt it against the house to do it! BUT it works great except the LED lights are on all the time when plugged in. I advise purchasing a double plug on/off plug in to the outside wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Greekladybug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound, HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.text: HIGHLY RECOMMEND! I was on the market for a beautiful replacement for my old front porch fountain which stopped working. I did a TON of research here on amazon and this fountain came very highly rated. NO SPILLS, NO LEAKS, great height at my entryway and the sound is beautiful! Worth every penny! There were other fountains I loved but they were rated very low and many complained of ugly leaks. Now I understand why this fountain is so highly rated. Don’t hesitate! Treat yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Boys

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and read a million reviews before buying something on amazon, your search stops here! Buy this fountain! We are totally amazed at the water sound and lighting that this fountain has. It has made our backyard feel so much more relaxing and enjoyable. So far we have had no issues with it functioning as designed. We did add a platform underneath to raise it up, as well as rocks around it to have it blend and look a bit higher. If you are considering this fountain, buy it, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Thomp-77

customer_reviews.title: Lovely garden addition.
customer_reviews.text: We love this fountain. I wish that it had an On/Off switch or a timer. Most important to us was the sound factor. It is like a babbling brook and works great in the yard. I dont use the lights often and it's good that they are separately controlled. We get many compliments on it. I have it placed on a terrace and had no problem lifting it alone. I am 5 ft. 2 in. Assembly was less than 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: Deserttyme

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome fountain!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome fountain! It setup very quickly and easily. I like it so much, I bought another from Alpine for our deck. We live in the mountains and this looks so realistic. The gray squirrels and birds, even the hummingbirds, love it, too, and have only had it a week!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fountain
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fountain.. Like other reviews mentioned.. water pressure is very good. Love the size and faux rocks look real. Led lights subtle and pretty at night. Water flow... love the pressure.. it does spray out if some wind hits the fountain. Doesn’t impact where we have it in the garden, so doesn’t bother us. Great fountain. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christy K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is my number one home shopping store. The fountain is beautiful. But I received it damaged. Cracks and hole. I was so upset. I never have been disappointed in anything I ordered from amazon. It’s so big to try to return, so I’m going to try to fix it. Water flow is wonderful. I’m sure it probably was tossed around during shipping. It is heartbreaking. I’m 65 years old and not easy to send back. I would have gave a 5 star if it had not been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kay James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, and even better customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this fountain over the weekend in my backyard. What was good about this experience: Shipping and delivery was in 2 days.... big box relatively light to move and place it where you need. Easy to install, works like a charm, looks really nice. What was my personal bad experience: After installing, i noticed the product is damaged.... I personally dont want to go through the hassle of re-packing, shipping back and getting another one to reinstalling. But again... customer service totally came through and are now in the process of sending me another once without having to send the damaged one back. AWESOME!!! GREAT PRODUCT, ON TIME DELIVERY, EASY TO SETUP, GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE..... 5 OF 5....
customer_reviews.author: S. Kini

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS FOUNTAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond delighted with this fountain! Appearance and SOUND coming from the falling water is very satisfying. You do need adapters to have both water pump and LED lights functioning if your duplex outlet is needed for other purposes such as landscape lights and sprinklers. You will not be sorry you make this purchase. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Diego

customer_reviews.title: love my waterfall
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, the only thing I can say is they should consider using solar for the lights, because the light issue is a pain. You wouldn't have to worry about using so much electric, in fact they should give you the option of a complete solar unit or electric. Times are changing, and the solar offers more option for placement. Realistic though
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle Linturn

customer_reviews.title: Best for use outside!  Very loud and splashy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really large and loud fountain. So, if you’re planning on using it inside like I did, be prepared for the sound which is much like standing next to Niagara Falls. This is definitely more suitable for exterior use. It’s very large, heavy and well-made. But not great for inside due to the noise and splashing everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Main

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I love this fountain except I’m a lil disappointed at the moment. It seems that there’s a slow leak, maybe a thin crack. We have to refill it every five days. And how do I return something like this so I guess I’ll have to find the crack and repair.
customer_reviews.author: Donna N.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchase this 4-Tiered Rock Fountain with LED Lights (WIN316). As you can see from the photo, it is a beautiful fountain and sounds wonderful. Shortly after setting up my fountain, I had an issue with it causing me to contact Troy at the Alpine Corporation. This guy knows his stuff and was wonderful to work with. He resolved my problem quickly and to my great satisfaction. If I could give Troy a 6-star review I would! Now I'm greatly enjoying the relaxing sounds of my new fountain!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jerger

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great fountain! Looked for about 2 hours before I decided on this one ! Sounds great plenty of water sound ! I set mine next to a tree and it looks amazing ! Doesn’t leak works flawlessly! Came packaged great thick foam!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Fountain
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 10 year old one level fountain and I couldn't be happier. Solved the winter freezing issue by putting a birdbath heater in the back water reservoir. The five water falls are nice though you will lose some water when there is a strong wind. Overall A++
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery R. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Best Fountain Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this fountain It was very easy to set up, one person no problem. I love the sound of it, it’s on my porch and not so loud we can’t visit as well, sounds like a creek running over rock. I filled it up once and have not had to since, I love that too, of course, we’ve had some rain which contributed to the water amount, but I hate having a fountain you have to fill every day, and this has been full for weeks I highly recommend this fountain!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking fountain
customer_reviews.text: My wife has transformed our back yard into a park - complete with flowers, a butterfly garden, bromeliads, a bird feeder and bird bath. She said the only thing missing was a water feature. So I bought this as a surprise. She loves it! It looks real nice and is soothing to listen to. Goes well with the flowers as you can see in the picture. It was very easy to assemble and was up and running in 5 minutes. Very nice product. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I want one for myself...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an anniversary gift for my parents. While they were out to dinner I drove over and put it together by myself in less than 30 minutes and left it on their back porch. When they came home they thought they had a burst water pipe, it scared them half to death. After they saw the waterfall they were so pleased. They think it is very realistic and it sounds amazing. I want one for myself...
customer_reviews.author: jacqrabbit

customer_reviews.title: Alpine Fountain
customer_reviews.text: We love our fountain. Simple to install, perfect fit for our patio. The water stream is perfect. Is there a motor? Yes there is, but u would never know. It is silent. Calming. This fountain is a great buy! One year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I’ve been searching for
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking off and on the last two summers for a tall fountain to put on our deck, but everything I found at this price point was really cheap looking. This fountain pulls off a natural rocky look without the heft of actual rock. It also has a lovely flow that is nice to look at and listen to. The fountain is fairly loud (which is what I wanted to cover traffic noise) so keep that in mind if you are looking to put it in a small or indoor space. Absolutely love it and was able to get the box to the back porch and put it together on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Egan

customer_reviews.title: The fountain looks great and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a week in my bedroom. It made the carpet wet, so I returned for a replacement. The carpet still gets wet. I have been very careful to follow all the setup instructions. The fountain looks great and sounds great. I plan to keep the product this time, but will have to put something underneath so the carpet doesn't get wet. This may end up looking tacky. I suggest you not buy this product unless you plan to use it outside or you don't mind making provision to protect your floor indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Beall

customer_reviews.title: One small problem
customer_reviews.text: really like the fountain. It fits nicely where I wanted it. The water sound is very nice even on the lowest setting. However one small piece was broken off the top right hand side. Rather than returning it , I found the piece in the bottom of packing and I will just glue it back on.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie dean

customer_reviews.title: Deck Water Fountain
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product. It was easy to assemble with very few parts and the water sounds are very relaxing. In addition, I love the way it looks. I shopped around for other more expensive fountains and they did not look as realistic as this fountain. I am extremely pleased with my purchase and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona M. Voge

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, look real
customer_reviews.text: I got it at 50% off, bigger than I thought and its perfect size to out in front of my door. Easy set up and working out of the box. Cant be happier. Hope its gonna working for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Ken Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty loud. I live in an apartment and wanted some background noise, this does the trick. It's in my living room so when I turn the tv on I unplug otherwise the tv is too loud but it really is a perfect piece. I get compliments on it from everyone
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Turner

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fountain that graces the patio in the back of my home. I am very pleased with its appearance and with its calming effect. I have put it on a timer assuring that it turns on in the early evening and shuts off shortly after midnight. Just the ideal addition for a relaxing experience in a beautiful environment. I highly recommend this wonderful fountain to all who enjoy nature and it’s sights and sounds.
customer_reviews.author: WAS

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain, LED broke
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the fountain. I am amazed that water is not falling outside it of since it really flows. Great water sound and the lights really add to it at night. About a month after having it an LED went out on the bottom part. I was disappointed that it broke so soon. That was the only reason for not giving it a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, not great operation.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful concept out of the box. Negatives are: Pump could not be turned down to lower flow so water splashes all over the floor. Inability to turn pump down makes the waterfalls too loud for conversation, goes through a lot of distilled water. If the pump worked properly, the fountain would have been given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Wood

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT AND AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this fountain for an outdoor patio garden that my wife works hard to keep up. The fountain worked wonderfully for 2-3 weeks and then an LED light went out. We texted the customer service number in our owner's manual within minutes Alpine was able to help us resolve the problem. The fountain is beautiful. I fly fish and love the sound of a river - the fountain sounds just like the river and reminds me of being outdoors enjoying nature. Just buy one or two or three - you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived 1 1/2 days early right in the middle of a heat wave in Los Angeles. I opened and set up the fountain in 15 minutes. Instruction guide is excellent. The fountain is very nice. If there is anything I would change it is to make the paint flat as opposed to a shiny surface. The pump is at least twice the size as my old fountain pump, size matters. This pump pushes a lot of water even at the 1/2 setting I chose. I am very happy with this purchase and highly recommend this product. I'm going to check the box, it must be made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular Value!
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular value! I have been looking for a water feature for my yard for 2 decades!, and just not been happy with the options. This is beautiful to look at, and the sound is lovely. Very easy to assemble, I think it is very well made. I took a chance after seeing a friend's photo, and am so happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Dayla  White

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely addition to our little rock garden that sits in front of our front porch! The fountain is just right, just the right height, easy to set up, and hopefully will last a long time! Will check the water level daily in the summer and use vinegar weekly to add to the water for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: CindyB

customer_reviews.title: Alpine customer service, by Leonard, was top-notch.
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the appearance of this fountain. At night it is wonderful to have LEDs. I especially like to fact that I can unplug the lights and leave them off until I sit out at night-they should last longer. The sound of the water is that of a much larger fountain, which I like a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful feature to our backyard
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful feature to our backyard!!! No problem with set up as long as directions are read. Set water regulator on high and no splash since we tilted the feature a little toward the back. Well worth the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this fountain!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain has transformed my patio into a soothing oasis. It was super easy to set up. You may need help removing from box because it is heavy. But within a few minutes of attaching the pump, filling with water and plugging in...ahhh sit back and relax!
customer_reviews.author: Nawlins Gal

customer_reviews.title: Nice water feature!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely feature on my back deck patio! The sound level is perfect to add a feeling of tranquility that was missing until the waterfall was added. It did seem to initially leak at the base, so I sprayed the entire bottom surface with 5-6 coats of clear Flex-seal. This took care of the problem, and it has been constantly in use for 14 days without needing to add more water (but it is currently a cool time of the year). Very happy with the waterfall for the price, and hoping it will continue to function without any difficulties for a number of years.
customer_reviews.author: longs2quilt

customer_reviews.title: One of LCD alights burned out in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Pretty natural looking fountain that fits exactly where I wanted it to. Love the sound of falling water. I put plants behind it and around it so it looks pretty good. Only bad thing is the the middle LVD light burned out but I can live without it but it should not had happened,
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN EVANS

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR INDOOR USE.
customer_reviews.text: Overall - Seems well made. Nice LED lighting included. VERY noisy. The pump is quiet, but the water sounds like Niagra Falls. This is DEFINITELY AN OUTDOOR PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: Was estimated to arrive May 26th... actually arrived May 15th. Packaged very well - a testament to the manufacturer's belief in delivering a quality product at a surprisingly low price. Instructions were very clear. Pond was set up and running in about 20 minutes. We're very pleased. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I like the fountain but not happy with lights
customer_reviews.text: I like the fountain but not happy with lights. I purchased for my wife for mothers day. The LED lights have burned out after about a dozen uses. We run the fountain in the day throughout the summer and have only had the lights on at night 12 times. Very unhappy. LED lights should last a lot longer than 4 -5 months and 12 uses.
customer_reviews.author: GSW

customer_reviews.title: Very Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I've had the waterfall for a little over a month. It's outside on the porch and is surrounded by plants. Sound is very relaxing and the lights at night are beautiful. Very happy and would recommend. Know it's probably not recommended but my nieces use it for a spa for their Barbies.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret  A Chasteen

customer_reviews.title: Looks & Works Great.  Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain has such a natural look that when placed in the midst of vegetation it adds to the ambiance. It becomes the focal point. the sound of running water is peaceful. All in all, it adds much to your environment. And, it was easy to set up. I highly recommend this water fountain! Unlike some products, the retailer does not try to bride a favorable (5-star) review by offering you a coupon or rebate. Thus this review of 5 stars is based solely on the merit of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fountain , easy to set up and instant pleasure
customer_reviews.text: This is a relaxing, beautiful fountain . nestled between two real rocks in our garden..it is really pretty.. we needed an extension cord, so couldn't plug in the lights..used a solar light pointed on the fountain it looks very realistic. Many compliments from our guests.
customer_reviews.author: LD

product_meta.title: Alpine Corporation 4-Tier Rock Water Fountain with LED Lights - Outdoor Water Fountain for Garden, Patio, Deck, Porch - Yard Art Decor
product_meta.description: Relax and enjoy the sounds of nature with the Alpine Corporation 4-Tier Rock Fountain! You will feel like you are sitting next to a majestic mountain stream in the great outdoors all while relaxing in your own backyard. This outdoor fountain looks great in your garden, patio, deck, porch, or yard space. Take in the tranquil sounds of the water gently cascading over natural-looking grey stone. The polystone and fiberglass construction is weather-proof, rust-resistant, and durable for years of quality use. The three LED lights in the fountain tiers accent the movement of the trickling water for a subtle yet beautiful light source, day or night. To use, simply attach the pump to the hose, plug in to an outdoor outlet, fill lower level with water, and watch as the interior pump creates a lovely water flow reminiscent of a lush rainforest. With a 1-year , you can be confident in the quality of your purchase. Fountain measures 23"L x 18"W x 40"H for use in any indoor or outdoor setting.
feature_bullets: WATERFALL FOUNTAIN: Garden water fountain is the perfect addition to your outdoor decor. Interior pump keeps the water flowing - just plug it in!
RELAXING WATER FLOW: Water trickles from each tier to mimic the sounds of a real waterfall, adding peaceful ambiance to your outdoor setting
NATURAL LOOK: Realistic grey stone rock tower brings a touch of natural beauty to your space
DURABLE: Polystone and fiberglass construction is rust and weather-resistant to keep your outdoor fountain looking new over time
IDEAL SIZE: Water fountain measures 23"L x 18"W x 40"H, the perfect size for any outdoor setting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars994 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
